title: Have a perfect day
excerpt: Try this: open a new document in your text-editor of choice, and write down, in clearest detail, your version of the perfect day.

children.text: Try this: open a new document in your text-editor of choice, and write down, in clearest detail, your version of the perfect day.
It doesn’t have to be grandiose. It could just be a morning talking to friends, and an afternoon spent
Point is, once you have it—once you know what your perfect day looks like and feels like and tastes like—you’ll be in much better position to live it.
To do the things that bring you joy. (Not money, not status…but
…things of little fiscal value that make you uniquely happy).
After all, if all you have to do to
a happy life is live enough days that feel like your perfect one, well,
you’ve just discovered the secret to renewable happiness
